author: billbarker
msg: Refactoring ugly hack (I won't be able to test on Solaris until tomorrow).  The Sun Windows 1.4.x JVM has no problems with this (even before ugly hack).
Restoring PureTLS-first logic.  With JSSE shipping with 1.4.x, this is even more important than before.
Most importently, adding c-l, so that we may be able to track-down the root-cause of the problem.
